about_the_game:
🪄 Welcome to the World of Wandaria! 🪄

Get ready to step into a realm where magic, survival, and epic battles await. In Wandaria, each player experiences a unique journey as a wizard, explorer, and defender of their own domain in a dynamic PvPvE environment!

🌌 The Story of Wandaria

Long ago, the world of Wandaria was unified through peace and magic. But dark events have shattered that balance, creating conflict and unleashing mysterious, untamed forces. As a wizard, you are invited to rebuild, explore, and conquer these lands. Will you survive and master the secrets of magic?

⚔️ Gameplay: Magical Survival PvPvE

Dive into a Wild, Epic World

In Wandaria, you’ll embark on a Survival journey packed with challenges. Expect wizard duels in PvP and encounters against formidable creatures and forces (PvE). Your magical skills will be your greatest assets as you face enemies, explore the world, and defend your territory.

🧙 Wizard Duels and Wild Battles

Looking to test your powers in structured duels or spontaneous skirmishes?

  • Wild Duels: Encounter other players in the world and challenge them in fierce, on-the-spot battles.

  • Wizard Duels: For more structured, honorable fights, special arenas are available where magical duels let you showcase your mastery of spells in a controlled environment. Prepare your spells and face off against your opponents with all the honor of a true wizard!

🏰 Build and Defend Your Own Domain

In Wandaria, your home is much more than just a shelter:

  • Construction and Upgrades 🛠️: Create a space that reflects you, adding rooms, spell libraries, and fortifications.

  • Defense Against Raids 🛡️: Other players can launch raids on your domain. Prepare your defenses and protect your territory from invaders!

  • Customization: Make your domain a sanctuary of peace or an unassailable magical fortress.

🌱 Cultivation and Crafting

The lands of Wandaria are rich in resources, allowing you to support your magical and survival endeavors:

  • Magical Plants and Crops 🌿: Grow herbs and magical vegetables to craft potions, elixirs, and other powerful consumables.

  • Creature Husbandry 🐉: Train and tame unique creatures that can accompany you and even defend your domain. Create your own creature farm to raise powerful, loyal companions.

🎓 Central Castle: Academy of Magic and Safe Zone (PvE)

The Castle of Wandaria is the heart of magic and learning. Improve your skills and learn new techniques in a secure environment:

  • Classes and Workshops: Take classes in potions, magic, botany, and more! Each discipline unlocks special abilities that allow you to thrive in Wandaria.

  • Conquest Infrastructure: Discover merchants, a bank, and even a quest center to aid you on your journey.

  • Marketplace: You can sell or trade resources with other players right here in the castle.

🌍 A World to Explore: Diverse Biomes Full of Mysteries

Each biome has its own vibe and mysteries to uncover. Prepare for adventures filled with unique discoveries and challenges:

  • Varied Biomes 🌋❄️🍄: Roam through desert, snowy, burnt lands, magical mushroom forests, and more!

  • Unique Resources and Climates: Every zone offers unique resources, creatures adapted to the environment, and a climate that will test your skills.

  • Secret Caves and Bosses 👹: Each biome holds its secrets, with dark caves teeming with dangerous creatures and powerful bosses waiting for the brave.

🏕️ Reputation System and Camps: Friend or Foe?

Your choices affect your reputation, which will impact your gameplay:

  • Magical Reputation 🌗: Be cautious! Dark magic might attract powerful enemies, while honorable choices open unexpected doors.

  • Unlock Rare Spells and Blueprints 📜: A strong reputation will grant access to spells and blueprints others can’t obtain, adding a strategic layer to your decisions in Wandaria.

⚖️ Balanced and Safe Raid System

To ensure everyone enjoys Wandaria, we’ve designed a system that prevents excessive or punishing raids. Prepare for an adventure where players can progress at their own pace without fear of unfair attacks!

🌟 Join the Adventure!

Help us bring Wandaria to life! Be part of an enchanting world where every player can create, explore, and battle in a unique PvPvE survival experience.

✨ Thank you for joining this epic journey! Together, we will build Wandaria. ✨

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later (64-Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400 (2.7 GHz 4 Core)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 (req. 6GB VRAM) / AMD Radeon RX 580 (req. 6GB VRAM) / Intel ARC A380
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: ternet connection required for multiplayer. SSD required.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later (64-Bit)
  • Processor: i9-9900K 3.6 GHz 8 Core
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2070
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: ternet connection required for multiplayer. SSD required.

short_description: In Wandaria, use magic to survive against creatures, rivals, and world dangers. Build, cultivate, and explore mysterious lands. Form alliances or defend your domain. Magic is your greatest weapon.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain
